https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/afqITrBUY2PZYargVMnglAPXcq8.jpg Is love an ego to save yourself, or... Based on Takayama Makoto's autobiographical novel, this film tells the story of the love between Kosuke, an editor, and Ryuta, a personal trainer. Egoist
